test_scenarios.name: Successful Account Creation and Login
steps: Enter valid personal information (name, email, address, phone number, SSN).
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged into the Chime application dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: View Checking Account Balance
steps: Navigate to the Checking account overview.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Checking account balance is displayed accurately.

test_scenarios.name: Successful Debit Card Transaction
steps: Make a debit card purchase at a merchant (e.g., using Apple Pay or Google Pay configured with the Chime card).
Verify the transaction appears in the Chime app's transaction history.
test_scenarios.expected_result: The debit card transaction is successfully processed and reflects in the app's transaction history shortly after the purchase.
